QuestData.Title: We're Under Attack!
QuestData.Description: The Alliance are at our walls!$B$BYour actions delayed them and weakened their forces, $n, but in the end we are outnumbered. This is our last stand. Victory or death...$B$BFight with honor, $n. They are within the walls as we speak. Drive the human dogs from Stonard, for the Horde!
QuestData.CompletionText: There is no time! Go! Fight!
QuestData.RewardText: The Alliance is driven out! Stonard will be safe, thanks to your ferocity. Lok'tar Ogar!
